message: Let's split it 7:3, a fair start!
Meet me halfway, let's see if we can do better
I'll give you a slight edge, but I need to keep some for myself!
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not there yet
I'm getting closer to your target, meet me in the middle!
Getting closer to my target, but I'm not giving up yet
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I need something in return
Getting close to the end, let's make a deal
